about_the_game:
WARNING: NSFW-Video & screen shots censored for marketing, game shows regular nudity! Join Anya, a stripper at TTT, as she becomes an unsuspecting hero on an inter-dimensional adventure to make it home alive and save her friends from evil!
STRIPPER ANYA: DEMON SLAYER is a retro inspired beat 'em up/brawler that should be played with a lighthearted and comedic approach!

IMPORTANT! If you buy this game and play on a Windows 10 System, READ THIS FIRST:
... if you blow this off the game will not run correctly. :D Thanks!

Get Anya's X-Mas Special featuring an all new Lap Dance simulator! <3

NEW & OUT NOW from X-MiGuplay: BARE BOOB BRAWLERZ: POWER CLAW


Coming soon from X-MiGuPLAY!

Also from X-MiGuPLAY: "X-MiGu Fighters ... the sequel to Stripper Anya!"


Stripper Anya: Demon Slayer marks X-MiGuPLAY's 1st PC title and was inspired by silicone, scifi & 80's arcade beat 'em ups!

Your friends will judge you but we won't! 😉#guiltypleasures

content_descriptors.notes:

Enjoy!  

8===D~~~  ( o Y o )

WARNING: NSFW-Video & screen shots censored for marketing, game shows regular nudity! Join Anya, a stripper at TTT, as she becomes an unsuspecting hero on an inter-dimensional adventure to make it home alive and save her friends from evil!
STRIPPER ANYA: DEMON SLAYER is a retro inspired beat 'em up/brawler that should be played with a lighthearted and comedic approach!

name: STRIPPER ANYA™ DEMON SLAYER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N3050 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anya will run on an integrated Intel HD Graphics card. Initial load time is lengthy with these specs, X-MiGuPLAY highly encourages at least an i3 CPU with a PCI-X Graphics card with dedicated video memory.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or higher
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: PCI-X graphics card with 1 GB of dedicated video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: X-MiGuPLAY highly encourages at least an i3 CPU with a PCI-X Graphics card with dedicated video memory.

short_description: Tired of everyone getting offended about everything?!? 🙌 So are we! How about a Topless brawler?! 😍 Your friends will judge you but we won't! #guiltypleasures This is a retro inspired brawler/beat 'em up meant to be played lightheartedly with a comedic approach. Enjoy!
